name: hello-lab
description: Basic VM boot lab with cloud-init

name: nginx-lab
description: Learn to install and configure Nginx as a web server inside a VM

name: raid-lab
description: RAID lab with LVM and ZFS virtual machines, each with 4 extra disks

name: firewall-lab
description: Firewall lab with iptables, ufw, and Wireshark using 2 interconnected VMs

name: dns-lab
description: DNS lab with BIND9 server and client for learning record types and zone management

name: apache-lab
description: Apache web server lab with SSL/TLS and virtual hosts

name: docker-lab
description: Docker containers and Docker Compose lab

name: lvm-lab
description: LVM lab with extra virtual disks for PV, VG, and LV management

name: mysql-lab
description: MySQL/MariaDB lab for database management, users, and backups

name: ssh-lab
description: SSH hardening lab with fail2ban, port knocking, and key authentication

name: vpn-lab
description: VPN lab with WireGuard and OpenVPN using server and client VMs

name: systemd-lab
description: Systemd lab for service management, unit files, timers, and journald

name: dhcp-lab
description: DHCP lab with server and client VMs to learn dynamic IP addressing

name: ldap-lab
description: LDAP lab with OpenLDAP server, phpLDAPadmin, and client for directory services

name: mail-lab
description: Mail server lab with Postfix and Dovecot, send/receive mail between 2 clients

name: filesharing-lab
description: File sharing lab comparing FTP, NFS and Samba protocols with dedicated servers and a shared client

name: pam-lab
description: PAM authentication lab: modules, policies, 2FA, LDAP integration with sssd
